DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Review Enseal Laparoscopic Vaginal Assisted Hysterectomy ( LAVH ) Versus Traditional LAVH
DOC.detailed_description: 79 woman benign uterine disease underwent laparoscopic assist vaginal hysterectomy without bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy . Subjects chart divide two group base surgical technique follow parameter review retrospectively : surgical time , blood loss , uterine weight , patient weight , patient age , post operative fever > 100.4 F , readmission hospital within one week , return operate room within 24 hour , length hospital stay , blood transfusion . Group A , N=35 use traditional suture technique vaginally . Group B , N=44 use Enseal coagulation cut device vaginally .
DOC.criteria: none , observational study none , observational study
